name: The Space Game - Redux
description:
Welcome!

This is 'The Space Game - Redux', a simple infinite arcade shooter and the first game release by Squared Tower!

The Space Game was originally developed by Jacob Floyd in 2009.
The project was revived, re-coded, and expanded in 2021 by his brother in his honor under the original studio name "Squared Tower".

I hope you enjoy our game. :)

-------------------------------------------------------------

Important Note:

There is an online leaderboard associated with this game. Your highscore is saved locally and/or there when applicable, but only when you click 'Main Menu' from the pause menu or after you game-over! 

Be sure to set your name in the main menu before playing for the first time or it will upload with the default 'Player1' and you won't get all the glory!

Also, highscores are disabled if you use cheat codes ;)

-------------------------------------------------------------

View Online Scoreboard:
